channel.title: CloudIn 728 Join Today
channel.description:
[center][img]http://cloudin728.com/images/logo.png[/img][/center]
[b][center]About CloudIn728
CloudIn728 Is a private server remake of CloudIn 704 back in 2011, Back in 2011 we had over 100 people playing, our secondary Owner/Developer Keiron(Me) quit back in 2011 due to being annoyed with the other Owner, now today Keiron is fully 100% Owner and is in charge of everything we have over 100 players playing again and more to come due to upcoming promotional video which is going to be made by IxKarim.
What makes us better than other servers?
Well first of all, we have two In-Game Developers (Keiron(Me), Spiritwo(Joey)) That are doing updates constantly every day and fixing all the bugs we can find, we have one Web Developer which is (Justin) That has done an amazing job on the Forums So we can do all our work on the Server without worrying about the forums at all.
Why should I play CloudIn?
CloudIn is a 718 loading 728 server, we are nothing like any other 728 loading server, we guarantee that you have never played a server like this. We also like to offer you a chance to use our new unique point system called CloudIn Points, to obtain points you have to kill npcs or players but you will be rewarded by the chance to use the new points to buy the best equipment on the server (PVP armour/Weapons). You can play now instantly and join the adventure with hundreds of others.
Visit our forums to keep up-to-date with the latest updates & get involved with our community.
Forums: cloudin728.com/ Webclient: cloudin728.com/webclient.html Download: cloudin728.com/download.html
Make sure your java is updated to jre7 java.com
ou Do NOT need to Register to Play!!
What makes CloudIn different from other Servers?
CloudIn is a server dedicated to 100% Economy, PvM and nothing else! We have 60+ players online at any one given time! So come join us here at CloudIn now! First day open we reached 50 players online, growing fast & STRONG!
Features of CloudIn728:
*CloudIn Points(For Killing Npcs/Players) *Wilderness Points(For Killing Npcs in the Wilderness, Players.) *Vote Points(For Voting). *Loyalty Points(Staying only for 30minutes will give you loyalty points). *Godwars *Ganodermic Beasts *Corporeal BEast *All 24 Skills Working/Obtainable Completionist Cape/Customizeable. *Friends Chat - ClanChat - Dungeoneering System - Decent and fun economy. - All special attacks. - 24.7 Uptime - Trading - Webclient - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - Active helpful staff - 3 Levels of Donator status - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - Summoning - 100% working leeches - Runescape like Combat - redone accuracy to be like runescape - Working Korasis Sword - Multi Barrages - Xp Counter - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. - Working Teleblock - Staff of light Special - Yell with custom tags - Daily Events! [/center]
[center][img]http://gyazo.com/eac48441fc1b8af5a7eb2e113550b8fc.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/273a309b89014d0697cc2412b84e28d3.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/594a10ae20c69d1519f3ca604ae2b199.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/1df657b8feaa7671ead85b30637db554.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/fb832c04128d22d118bd744d58eb7e1b.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/54276723a8d51a99b1fe86b6ab927c98.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/245cca6fcaa776575dd08f27956a0e46.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/8787a0a09a6e57d8d3e4435ee4b85d16.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/4a0958f267e9fb08e7f62a86bf7b492c.png[/img][/center]
[color=green]To be honest with you guys, I only opened the server up for couple of friends in march because they we're tired of ignorant and owners that never do updates at all, but now I see that we've reached over 100 players online at one given time and 70+ on at all times and we're coming a sucess so now I'm going to post advertisement threads on the appropiate websites.
I haven't posted much content due to having a short time to make this thread due to that I have to go get a new mouse cause my mouse just broke, but if you would like to visit our updates section you will see all the unique and awesome updates, thank you, Keiron. [/center]

item.title: CloudIn 728 Join Today
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I played the server for a while until I became busy, Iâ€™ll vouch for it I suppose.

item.description:
@deaneo8 wrote:

[center][/center]

[b][center]About CloudIn728

CloudIn728 Is a private server remake of CloudIn 704 back in 2011, Back in 2011 we had over 100 people playing, our secondary Owner/Developer Keiron(Me) quit back in 2011 due to being annoyed with the other Owner, now today Keiron is fully 100% Owner and is in charge of everything we have over 100 players playing again and more to come due to upcoming promotional video which is going to be made by IxKarim.

*Godwars
